about.title: Why entrust us with a new project?
about.subtitle: SE Investing brings together two decades of experience in the construction and technology sectors, guaranteeing professionalism, clear costs, and reliable timelines.
about.text: In a sector full of pitfalls like infrastructure and technology, we strive to stand out for fairness and transparency.

solarScroll.title: Design and Feasibility Studies
solarScroll.subtitle: We bring expertise and innovation in technologies for the energy transition, decarbonization, and integrated waste management. From feasibility to design to implementation.
servicesSection.card1.title: Design and Feasibility Studies
servicesSection.card1.text: We bring expertise and innovation in technologies for the energy transition, decarbonization, and integrated waste management. From feasibility to design to implementation.
servicesSection.card2.title: Efficiency and organization through digital
servicesSection.card2.text: Thanks to a dedicated internal AI system interconnected with site hardware, we can track daily work, keep the client updated remotely via cloud sharing, facilitate management control, and identify any deviations from the schedule.
sustainabilitySection.title: Real sustainability
sustainabilitySection.text1: SE Investing truly cares about the environment and can track both estimated and actual environmental impact of projects. We use only certified sustainable materials where required and manage supply chain traceability.
sustainabilitySection.text2: To balance environmental impact, measured emissions can be offset—at the client's request—through reforestation projects, thanks to partnerships with various specialized organizations.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.body:
Privacy Policy

Pursuant to Article 13 of EU Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR), SE Investing S.r.l. informs you that the personal data collected will be processed in compliance with current legislation and the principles of fairness, lawfulness, and transparency.

1. Data Controller
The data controller is SE Investing S.r.l., with registered office at [address], email: [email].

2. Purpose of Processing
Personal data are processed for: a) responding to information requests; b) managing job applications and personnel selection; c) fulfilling legal obligations.

3. Processing Methods
Processing is carried out using manual and IT tools, adopting appropriate security measures to protect the data.

4. Data Retention
Data will be retained for the time necessary to achieve the purposes for which they were collected and, in any case, no longer than required by law.

5. Data Subject Rights
The data subject may exercise the rights provided for in Articles 15-22 of the GDPR, including access, rectification, erasure, restriction, and objection to processing, by writing to [email].

6. Communication and Disclosure
Data will not be disclosed. They may be communicated to third parties only for legal obligations or purposes strictly related to the management of the relationship.

7. Complaint
The data subject has the right to lodge a complaint with the Data Protection Authority.

For further information, please consult the full privacy policy on our website.
location.paris.title: Paris, France
location.paris.description: The city of lights, renowned for its art, culture, and fine cuisine.
location.paris.extendedInfo: Discover the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre, and stroll along the Seine.
location.santorini.title: Santorini, Greece
location.santorini.description: An iconic island with white houses and blue domes, spectacular sunsets over the Aegean Sea.
location.santorini.extendedInfo: Experience the magic of the Cyclades with volcanic beaches and picturesque villages.
location.kyoto.title: Kyoto, Japan
location.kyoto.description: Ancient imperial capital, famous for temples, zen gardens, and centuries-old traditions.
location.kyoto.extendedInfo: Admire cherry blossoms and join tea ceremonies.
location.machu.title: Machu Picchu, Peru
location.machu.description: The lost city of the Incas, nestled between the Andes and the Amazon rainforest.
location.machu.extendedInfo: Explore mysterious ruins and scenic trails.
thanks_to_ai_system: Thanks to a dedicated internal AI IT system interconnected with the construction site hardware, we can track daily work, keep clients updated even remotely via cloud sharing, facilitate management control, and identify any deviations from the schedule.
